Why DEVOPS?

DEVOPS is a leading developer in the field of information and communication technologies. For many years, we have been creating innovative digital solutions for financial institutions in Uzbekistan. Our technologies are successfully implemented in the banking sector, improving processes, ensuring security, and optimizing work.

  • üîπ Automating operations in financial institutions
  • üîπ Developing and implementing secure financial services
  • üîπ Integrating cutting-edge technologies into existing systems
  • üîπ Optimizing workflows using the latest IT solutions

Who are DevOps Engineers?

DevOps engineers are IT professionals who combine software development (Dev) and IT operations (Ops) to improve collaboration and productivity by automating infrastructure, workflows, and continuously measuring application performance.

Originally, DevOps emerged as a methodology to bridge the gap between development and operations teams, ensuring faster and more reliable software delivery. Over time, the role has evolved to encompass various responsibilities such as infrastructure as code (IaC), CI/CD pipeline automation, and cloud-native technologies.

  • üí° Automating software development and deployment processes
  • üîß Managing infrastructure as code (IaC) with tools like Terraform & Ansible
  • üì¶ Containerization and orchestration using Docker & Kubernetes
  • üìä Monitoring and logging with Prometheus, Grafana, and ELK stack
  • ‚òÅÔ∏è Cloud computing with AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud
